title: Font from pag.23 of the book "In the Cage: A guide to Sigil", from 1995
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140724103543im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Font19_pag_6631.23.jpg)
  
Sorry for the bad quality :| Could not find any better material here.  
Maybe this can help the identification: The source is at pag.23 of this old 1995 Planescape  
 [manual](http://web.archive.org/web/20140724103543/http:/www.scribd.com/doc/117655597/Planescape-D-D-2nd-In-the-Cage-A-Guide-to-Sigil-OCR)
author: Paolo G
